content_descriptors.notes:
When players change clothes for the desktop avatar, some clothes may look short.

All avatars are 18+.

name: Dinosaurs Live Wallpaper: with Secret Sandboxes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
